Description of incident: The state of Massachusetts is              warning 150,000 members of its Prescription Advantage insurance program              that their personal information may have been snatched by an identity              thief. Local authorities arrested a lone identity thief who had been              using information taken from the program in an attempted identity              theft scheme. Although the thief used information from just a small              number of participants in the scheme, state data-breach laws require              that the 150,000 people who could have possibly been affected by the              breach be contacted.
